case_name: Pacific Oil and Gas, LLC v. Chesapeake Energy Corp.

docket_entries.description: COMPLAINT with trial location of Kansas City ( Filing fee $400, Internet Payment Receipt Number AKSDC-3874711.), filed by Erin R Cottman, Charles G Clark, Oil and Gas Technology, Pacific Oil and Gas, LLC, John S Keneally, Chisholm Partners, LLC, Jonathan S. Wimbish, Trustee of J&M Wimbish Family Trust, William Gumma, Trustee of Orinoco Revocable Trust Dated Janaury 7, 1999, John Horne, Claire C Keneally, Edwin C. Brown, Trustee of the Edwin C. Brown Family Trust, Ian M Keneally, Susan C. Connell, Trustee of CP Management Trust, Ronald J Lincoln, Conover H. Able, Clarence Cottman, Bill Pearson.(Frickleton, James) (Entered: 07/13/2016)

CIVIL COVER SHEET by Plaintiffs Conover H. Able, Chisholm Partners, LLC, Charles G Clark, Clarence Cottman, Erin R Cottman, Edwin C. Brown, Trustee of the Edwin C. Brown Family Trust, John Horne, Jonathan S. Wimbish, Trustee of J&M Wimbish Family Trust, Claire C Keneally, Ian M Keneally, John S Keneally, Ronald J Lincoln, Oil and Gas Technology, Pacific Oil and Gas, LLC, Bill Pearson, Susan C. Connell, Trustee of CP Management Trust, William Gumma, Trustee of Orinoco Revocable Trust Dated Janaury 7, 1999. (Frickleton, James) (Entered: 07/13/2016)

DESIGNATION OF PLACE OF TRIAL filed by Plaintiffs Conover H. Able, Chisholm Partners, LLC, Charles G Clark, Clarence Cottman, Erin R Cottman, Edwin C. Brown, Trustee of the Edwin C. Brown Family Trust, John Horne, Jonathan S. Wimbish, Trustee of J&M Wimbish Family Trust, Claire C Keneally, Ian M Keneally, John S Keneally, Ronald J Lincoln, Oil and Gas Technology, Pacific Oil and Gas, LLC, Bill Pearson, Susan C. Connell, Trustee of CP Management Trust, William Gumma, Trustee of Orinoco Revocable Trust Dated Janaury 7, 1999 - trial to be held in Kansas City. (Frickleton, James) (Entered: 07/13/2016)

ORDER OF RECUSAL. District Judge John W. Lungstrum recused. Case reassigned to District Judge Julie A. Robinson for all further proceedings Signed by District Judge John W. Lungstrum on 07/14/2016. (This is a TEXT ENTRY ONLY. There is no.pdf document associated with this entry.)(ses) (Entered: 07/14/2016)
